entity.name: Russia reaches ceasefire agreement with Turkey over Idlib, Syria
entity.description: The ceasefire will take effect at midnight local time along the de-escalation line in Idlib, according to the agreement between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
